caption.p: Second-line treatment of trial-ineligible and trial-eligible patients. Sequencing of treatments in a trial-ineligible and b potentially trial-eligible patients. Percentages in second-line treatment refer to all patients who had received the respective first-line treatment. The treatment group “CTx or other” includes chemotherapy as well as all other treatments, including combination therapies. Abbreviations: CTx, chemotherapy; IMiD, immunomodulatory drug; PI, proteasome inhibitor
